SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_ISEFT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Is the recurring gift for a particular sponsorship paid through EFT (credit card or direct debit)
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_ISEFT ( @sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns bit with execute as caller as begin
declare @isEFT bit = null if @sponsorshipID is null set @isEFT = 0 else if exists ( select trans.ID from dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION trans join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD paymethod on trans.ID = paymethod.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on trans.ID = revsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP on SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID where SPONSORSHIP.ID = @sponsorshipID and paymethod.PAYMENTMETHODCODE in (2,3) -- Credit Card, Direct Debit and trans.TYPECODE = 2) -- recurring gift set @isEFT = 1 else set @isEFT = 0
return @isEFT end
